website_summaries.verdict: These snowboard boots integrate memory foam and thermal fleece to maximize comfort.
pros: They run true to size unlike a lot of snowboard boots, and they're great for high-impact winter sports due to its quality design and materials
The shoes lace up very tight
The white liner on the inside makes feet feel comfortable
cons: Stitching has been reported to break over time

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Boots
customer_reviews.text: People always said the DC snowboard boots run small so I bought the DC Mutiny 2016 model in US8 before, came out they are a bit large for me. While some other opinions said DC runs true to size, so I bought the Mutiny 2018 in US7 but have to return them. The quality is there, good heel hold and I like the colorway. It terms of length, they are true to size, yet in terms of width, they are way too narrow for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Chin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and nice quality. Make sure that toy understand how sizes work with these shoes. I wear a 7.5-8 American size shoes but had to order a 9 for this. Haven't tried it yet but looked sturdy. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. Thin padding in tongue. Cheap stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the boot fit true to size. The boots were snug and my toes touched the end as they should. I liked the heel padding that locks your foot in place. Expect a couple of days of boarding to break these in. Tongue padding is thin. I had issues with my bindings pressing the metal lace rings into the top of my foot. The stitching is cheap, as with most items made in China. Stitching began to break after one day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Great all around. Looks/feels good, also comfortable enough to walk around in! I got the size 12 (I wear a size 11.5 shoe) fits snug. (any smaller would have been too small)
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an 11.5 which fit comfortably. I usually wear 11's in shoes and feel if I got that size they would've been too small. You need to break them in as with any boot. They definitely keep my feet warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel_J

customer_reviews.title: Really nice material. My regular shoe size is 11 so ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them on slopes yet but they feel really confutable! Really nice material. My regular shoe size is 11 so I order 11.5D. Was a right decision to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The style and color is awesome though. Medium flex
customer_reviews.text: Runs VERY small. I usually wear 11 and had to return and buy a 13. Still a bit tight but now too large to fit in my bindings. The style and color is awesome though. Medium flex, good for beginners. I would recommend if you have smaller feet than me. Very few bindings will fit these if you have bigger feet. Go at least 1 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. Had to return them because they were too small, but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and amazing snowboard boots. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Flintoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, described correctly in description, and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is very comfortable. I wear size ten and purchased a size 11, fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ralph C Tolli Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought another pair with BOA system, hurt my feet so bad. These are super comfortable. Takes an extra 30 seconds to lace them tight, but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: BSG

product_meta.title: DC Men's Mutiny Lace Snowboard Boots
product_meta.description: Clean design and the simplicity of traditional lace closure make the mutiny a solid, hardworking freestyle boot.
feature_bullets: Wrap lock hardware for custom fit
